articles.author: Prachi Arya
articles.title: Unseen pics: Aamir Khan, ex-wife Reena dance with Nupur. Ira shares heartfelt note - India Today
articles.description: Ira Khan took to Instagram and penned a love note for fiance Nupur Shikhare along with several unseen pictures from their engagement bash last year. She shared precious memories from the celebrations featuring parents Aamir Khan and Reena Dutta.
